name: Chunhua Shen
content: Chunhua Shen Home Publications Teaching Chunhua Shen I am a Chair Professor at Zhejiang University, China. Before that, I was a Professor at The University of Adelaide, Australia. 沈春华, 浙江大学求是讲席教授、计算机辅助设计与图形系统全国重点实验室副主任、浙江工业大学计算机学院学术院长 I studied at The University of Adelaide, Australia (PhD), Australian National University (MPhil) and Nanjing University (BSc and MSc). News Hiring mutiple research associate and postdocs positions in LLMs, multimodal models, embodied AI, reinforcement learning. Please see this PDF for details. Open until filled. 长期有效. 08/2025. Our paper won the Pattern Recognition 2019 Best Paper Award Listed in the Australian’s Lifetime Achievers Leaderboard 2020 Open source toolbox for multiple instance-level detection and recognition tasks developed by my team The FCOS paper is regarded as one of the most impactful contributions in the field. FCOS is an anchor-free object detector, which solves object detection problems in a per-pixel prediction fashion. Most recent anchor-free object detectors employ FCOS as a basis. FCOS is included in pytorch 学生指导 博士研究生 朱慕之、赵灿宇、丁港归、徐光锴、谢康扬、焦笑然、高子惠、刘阳、王文、周健均、刘可、赵志岳、刘明宇、钟好、祝舟航 硕士研究生 黄政、叶彬宏、贺俊哲、张智涵、陈聪、蒋景伟 已毕业硕士研究生 李恒涛（理想汽车自动驾驶团队）、陈泳帆（阿里数据中台）、范承祥（蚂蚁百灵团队）、孙馨雨（快手可灵团队） Contact office: 浙江大学紫金港校区蒙民伟楼 email orcid linkedin © Chunhua Shen • last update: 2025-11-26 10:04:43 CST • ←→ • →←
